name: AstraWash
description:
AstraWash is a roguelike game where the players take on the role of a Space Washer, a worker from a cleaning brand of space.

You travel with Patouf, your proud dog from Earth and explore the space to clean enemies.

Start the game, push aliens in the lava with your weapon, come back to your ship, upgrade yourself and continue! Take care, space life is dangerous and if you die, you will restart all your travel.

Unleash the power of your AstraWasher2000 and have fun on AstraWash.

Your weapons:

After choosing your weapon, each round you will have another upgrade like a boost for your speed or your power, and more...

Project made for school project.

Credits :

  • Adrien Bordes
  • Pierre Marcos
  • Pierrot Tournier
  • Théo Calvez
  • Titouan Porteau

Controls :

  • WASD : move character
  • Left click: Shoot
  • Space: Dash

Made with Unity 2019 and FMOD
